icebreaker.text: Alright! Let me just enter this into our database here and we can get you on your way!

caught_noise.text: NO! STOP ASKING SO MANY QUESTIONS!

done_database.text: You're all set! Looks like it's your lucky day! We just happen to have a spare vehicle for you.

vehicle.text: This one's a beaut too! Brand new, only 100 miles, top safety ratings, what a deal!

deserve.text: Yup! We make sure every new contractee here at Broken Record Inc. gets what they deserve.

warning.text: You know what, I like you. Remind me of myself when I was your age. Here's a few bucks to get you started. Don't lose it all though, or it's game over for you.

leave.text: Be careful out there too. Lots of real weirdos in this town. Just make sure to keep your friends happy and you will be okay.
